My name is Yiwei Zheng, you can just call me Sylvie:)
I'm from China. I graduated from *University of Nottingham Ningbo China* and now Reading for Masters in Analytics and Management at *London Business School*.I have been exploring the data analysis field for 3 years. Below are my internship experiences:

- 2019: Interned as a **Data Scientist** for Hikvision, a world-leading IoT solution provider with video security systems as its competency
- 2020: Interned as a **Consulting Part-time Assistant** for EY-PARTHENON
- 2021: Interned as a **Business Analyst** for Deloitte IT Consulting
- 2021: Interned as a **Strategic Analyst** for Didi Chuxing, a dominant mobile transportation company in China
- 2022 to future: Keen on business analyst/data scientist role in consulting and technology industry. Meanwhile,I'm looking for opportunities to build my start-up!



You can contact me at [My LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yiwei-sylvie-zheng/) if you would love to have cooperation, coffee chat, know more about me. Looking forward to keeping in touch with you!
